`,(0,f.jsxDEV)(a.pre,{children:(0,f.jsxDEV)(a.code,{className:"language-ts:useMediaQuery.ts",children:`import { useCallback, useEffect, useState } from 'react';\r
\r
export const useMediaQuery = (width: number) => {\r
  const [targetReached, setTargetReached] = useState(false);\r
\r
  const updateTarget = useCallback((e: MediaQueryListEvent) => {\r
    if (e.matches) setTargetReached(true);\r
    else setTargetReached(false);\r
  }, []);\r
\r
  useEffect(() => {\r
    const media = window.matchMedia(\`(max-width: \${width}px)\`);\r
    media.addEventListener('change', updateTarget);\r
\r
    if (media.matches) setTargetReached(true);\r
\r
    return () => media.removeEventListener('change', updateTarget);\r
  }, []);\r
\r
  return targetReached;\r
};
